JobFullDesc: Job DescriptionOverviewWe are looking for a Sr. Software Engineer, SDT who will be responsible for developing all frontend applications and backend services for authentication, authorization, and identity storage & management for LogMeIn’s portfolio.The team primarily develops REST APIs and web experiences focused on sign in, profile management, and employee & customer facing administration portals, all running in AWS. The team also maintains relationships with 3rd party IdPs such as Okta, OneLogin, and Microsoft Azure to ensure a functioning presence within their respective app galleries for SAML login & automated user provisioning via SCIM.  The Identity Platform team at LogMeIn is looking for a Senior Software Developer in Test.
